title: Why is ADC mana not being nerfed as well?

replies.body:
since when adc should be gated by mana?

when i started this game, it was said that mages use spell to play the game and those spells cost more mana than the others

remember when every mages had 120 mana on their spells? and 300 mana on ult?

riot remembered their roots of design, now that they powercreeped every mage through mana costs they're reverse powercreeping mana items

that's it
since they started making AD casters in bot lane

> since when adc should be gated by mana?

Why should only one class be gated by a resource in addition to cool downs?

> [{quoted}](name=HaIlMonitor,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qM8HKaVV,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-04-18T13:17:58.913+0000)
>
> cool downs?

it's hardly a thing anymore too
i hope that after looking at mana costs they look at CDR and gut it not only in the mage department but everywhere

Cooldowns are hardly gated anymore
every mage has at least one low cd spell that reaches 1 or 2 seconds cd with cdr, it became absolutly ridiculous

Now in this thread a lot of people are going to bring up ADC to the talk but just because ADC are cancerous and broken doesn't excuse the fact that the mage class has hardly weaknesses now
and it's a FACT because they dominate the mid lane since a year now in competitive
and riot tries to buff zed a billion of time but it doesn't change anything in competitive, just makes him more aids in solo queue

In pro play they also get every blue buff after the first. 


In yoloque everything is being played though, and things are doing well all around....

> they dominate the mid lane since a year now

* Tanks in top
*  Tanks in JG
*  Mages in Mid
* ADCs (YEARS)
* Enchanters

Pro play doesnt change like at all.
Their changes are coming in 8.10/8.11; this mana stuff is in preparation for those changes among others.

> [{quoted}](name=Kairoptra,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qM8HKaVV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-18T11:56:41.741+0000)
>
> Their changes are coming in 8.10/8.11; this mana stuff is in preparation for those changes among others.

Their changes should of came first or at the same time, now mages will have a period where they will be extremely weak for no reason
No argument there; it is a little out-of-wack.

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qM8HKaVV,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-04-18T12:17:48.338+0000)
>
> lcs big plays

Can you explain it a bit more?
But wasnt the whole point of this making mana a bit more valuable? Making you think before you spam spells?

> [{quoted}](name=Krotux,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qM8HKaVV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-04-18T12:10:56.758+0000)
>
> But wasnt the whole point of this making mana a bit more valuable? Making you think before you spam spells?

ADC's mana pool/regen is not the problem. In fact they do not value mana as much because they do not need it as much.

Because they nerf each class according to their strenghts. If they wanna hit mages they hit their mana and ap, if they want to nerf ad's, they will look into crit and attack speed item, if they want to nerf assassins they will look into duskblade or gunblade or their kits, they won't just randomly nerf mages' auto attacks or adc's mana pools
